comments.content: Can't name it, most probably a proprietary font of Warner. Some in the same vein: [Threepoints North](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeassociates/threepoints-north), [Coldfield JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/coldfield), [Sweetmix](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/sweetmix), [Block Gothic RR](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr), [Rama Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rama-gothic)/ [Dharma Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/dharma-gothic), [Heron Sans FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/heron-sans) (probably the most interesting to rework), [Trump Gothic CT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic), [Vielzweck PTL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/vielzweck)
Thanks for your answer and all the infos! ;-)
